sentences.sContent: She managed to manoeuvre expertly into the parking space.
sentences.sCn: 她熟练地将车子驶进了车位。

sentences.sContent: We manoeuvred the TV in front of the sofa.
sentences.sCn: 我们把电视机挪到了沙发前面。

remMethod.val: 来自希腊文manu operare(用手做事)

words.tran: 可调动的；操纵灵活的；机动的
机动性；可移动；操纵的灵敏性

trans.tranCn: 演习；谨慎地运用技巧移动， 运动；熟练而巧妙地引导某人
trans.tranOther: to move or turn skilfully or to move or turn something skilfully, especially something large and heavy
